alert.note: Alert for South and East Jackson, Larimer, North and Northeast Grand, Northwest Boulder Counties Above 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 16 at 3:16PM MST until January 19 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM WEDNESDAY TO 5 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 8 and 16 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 70 mph with whiteout conditions over the higher mountain passes. * WHERE...Rocky Mountain National Park and the Medicine Bow Range. * WHEN...From 5 AM Wednesday to 5 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Roads will likely become slick and hazardous, especially through mountain passes. Use caution when traveling. Travel could be very difficult due to snow and blowing snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org. Chain and traction laws will possibly be enacted for the mountains. If traveling to the mountains, be prepared for winter driving conditions.

area.areaDesc: South and East Jackson, Larimer, North and Northeast Grand, Northwest Boulder Counties Above 9000 Feet
